trigger warning when redefinition occurs (#1265)

# Description

We were triggering redefinition warning irrespect if the redefinition
took change or not.

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Improved

- Redefinition warning only occurs when redefinition actually take place
